def segmentChannelData(raw_data):
    numChannels = raw_data.shape[1] // 2
    channels = []
    for i in range(numChannels):
        x = raw_data[:, 2 * i]
        y = raw_data[:, 2 * i + 1]
        channel_data = np.stack((x, y), axis=1) 
        channels.append(channel_data)
    return channels
